description: Mask Features: Ladies mask - One-size-fits-most; Hypoallergenic silicone face skirt for ultimate comfort; Pro-Glide buckle system for easy adjustments. Snorkel Features: Submersible, dry top snorkel with Pivot; Dry Technology - Designed to keep water out of the breathing tube above and below the surface of the water; Ergonomic silicone mouthpiece provides comfort and reduces jaw fatigue; Flex section maximizes comfort and improves fit; One way purge valve for easy clearing. Snorkel placement - Place snorkel on left side of face attaching snorkel keeper clip to mask strap. Mask Strap: Added comfort, won't pull hair; Neoprene.
title: U.S. Divers Women's Phantom LX Mask and Palau Snorkel, Aqua
